messages.subject: Thanks everyone!  Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: One Lurker Says Hi
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you so much!  I was just telling Glena offlist that even though I was trying to help YOU, I really in truly helped myself.  It s so easy to sit by
messages.messageBody:
Thank you so much! I was just telling Glena offlist that even though I was
trying to help YOU, I really in truly helped myself. It's so easy to sit by
myself, removed from the stress and post things like this. Not because it
isn't true but because it isn't always that way. I have bad days. Baaaad
days. But when I take the time to write about them, for myself or others, I
have something tangible to turn to. Someone to remind me that most of the
time, I'm doing the right thing. That I'm NOT alone! Isn't that
glorious!?!?!

I feel like the mother hen here, but I'm so proud of you for sharing your
frustrations. It's hard to admit when we are down. Scary to think that
someone might consider us bad parents. I love it that you feel safety in
this list as I do. I am honored that everyone who responded and possibly
many more were touched and affected by my experiences, for I am touched and
affected daily by this list. This is truly a wonderful group of women (and
men too!) with fascinating, inspiring and heartfelt stories that change my
life everytime I log on and check in.

Thanks guys! I can't wait to meet as many of you as possible in SC!!!

Jennifer


I snipped just a piece of your post (below) about your current stresses
(and, boy, do I feel for you!) and I noticed that, even when you didn't feel
very patient, you acted in a patient way. With all that is going on in your
life just now, I wanted to say kudos to you for not blowing up!

Nicholina
